SEARCH
程序包 si.model

类 Asteroid

java.lang.Object
si.model.Asteroid
所有已实现的接口:
Hittable, Movable
public class Asteroid extends Object implements Hittable, Movable
Represents asteroid in the Asteroids game. Implements the Hittable and Movable interface.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Asteroid

      public Asteroid(AsteroidType type, int x, int y, int angle)
      Constructor to initialize the Asteroid with the specified type, position, and angle.
      参数:
      type - The type of the asteroid.
      x - The x-coordinate of the asteroid.
      y - The y-coordinate of the asteroid.
      angle - The angle at which the asteroid is moving.

    • isHit

      public boolean isHit(Bullet b)
      Checks if the asteroid is hit by a bullet.
      指定者:
      isHit 在接口中 Hittable
      参数:
      b - The Bullet object to check for collision.
      返回:
      true if the asteroid is hit by the bullet, false otherwise.

    • isCrash

      public boolean isCrash(Player player)
      Checks if the asteroid has crashed with a player's ship.
      参数:
      player - The Player object representing the player's ship.
      返回:
      true if the asteroid has crashed with the player's ship, false otherwise.

    • destroy

      public ArrayList<Asteroid> destroy()
      Destroys the asteroid and generates new asteroids based on its type.
      返回:
      ArrayList of new asteroids created after destruction. Returns null for small asteroids.
